comment.body:
Yes, it is very easy to make SQL commands to retrieve profiles for each user and extrapolite more from that. :-(

** **

@ekaterina will implement soon [Zeroverse](/zeroverse.bit) ID support which gives anonymity, and thus protects its users.

I'd like i2p but "Probably not anytime soon, maybe second half of 2016"
